us.phonetic: /v. ˌoʊvɚˈleɪ; n. ˈoʊvɚˌleɪ/, (v. ō′vər lā′; n. ō′vər lā′)

example.eg: Emily overlaid the floor with lino.
example.egtrans: 埃米莉在地板上铺上了亚麻油地毡。

example.eg: Carpet overlays all the floors in the house.
example.egtrans: 房屋里所有的地板上都覆盖着地毯。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 覆盖于…之上, 覆盖, 铺在...上面

example.eg: The floors have an overlay of carpet.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 贴层, 敷面, 包面, 铺面

example.eg: Sonia uses overlays to add more details to the image she is using for her presentation.
example.egtrans: 索尼娅利用套图透明膜，给图像上增添更多细节，给她的演示用。

us.phonetic: /v. ˌoʊvɚˈleɪ; n. ˈoʊvɚˌleɪ/, (v. ō′vər lā′; n. ō′vər lā′)

example.eg: The vase has an overlay of gold leaf.
Liam overlays the vase with gold leaf.

us.phonetic: /v. ˌoʊvɚˈleɪ; n. ˈoʊvɚˌleɪ/, (v. ō′vər lā′; n. ō′vər lā′)

trans_examp.trans_cn: 覆盖在…的上面, 躺在…上面
